title: Pixel 3 screen unresponsive during phone calls after Android 10 upgrade. Will Android 11 fix this?
content: After upgrading to Android 10 on my Pixel 3 XL, every time I make or receive a phone call, the screen goes black and is COMPLETELY UNRESPONSIVE.  I can't do anything - not even end the call.  There are a lot of of other Pixel owners with the same issue.  My question is: will upgrading to Android 11 fix this issue or make it worse?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
